customer_reviews.title: California proposition 65 warning not listed before purchase

I would not have purchased this product had the warning been listed in the item description rather than saying it on the box after I already bought it. product_meta.title: Vremi Single Cup Coffee Maker - Includes 14 Ounce Travel Coffee Mug and Reusable Filter - Personal 1 Cup Drip Coffee Maker to Brew Ground Beans - Black and Silver Single Serve One Cup Coffee Dripper
product_meta.description:
Well hey there! Sure looks like you could use a pick-me-up. Lucky for you, here's the Vremi Pick-Up Artist Coffee Maker. It works with your favorite ground coffee beans; it's built for durability and versatility; and its mug loves to travel with you. This electric coffee maker makes the coffee making procedure very simple and easy, as the coffee is brewed directly into the traveler mug. Its stainless steel mug is well insulated to keep the coffee inside warmer for a longer period of time. Unlike other coffee makers, this comes with a reusable strainer allowing you to brew your own coffee grounds or tea. This small and lightweight unit can be easily transported from one location to another. It's the perfect size for tight counter spaces in your home, dorm or office. If you prefer to set up the appliance at home, then you can just grab the mug and take your coffee to go after it's brewed. It also has an auto shut off feature after brewing, giving you peace of mind as you head out the door.

Product Details & Care

 * Includes 1 Coffee Maker with Travel Mug and Lid, and Reusable Filter
 * Materials: Stainless Steel and BPA Free Plastic
 * Coffee Maker size: 6 x 5 x 10 inch (15 x 13 x 25 cm)
 * Travel Mug Size: 5.75 x 3.5 inch (15 x 9 cm)
 * Power: 120V, 60HZ, 700W
 * Weight: 1.2 pounds
 * Unplug appliance after and when not in use.
 * To clean Coffee Maker, unplug and wipe with damp soft cloth and dry thoroughly
 * To clean Travel Mug, hand wash with gentle soap
 * To clean Filter, rinse under warm water

For full care instructions and safety warnings, always refer to Vremi product box and manual.
feature_bullets: PERSONAL DRIP COFFEEMAKER - Single cup electric coffee maker set for regular ground coffee beans in black and silver with 14oz travel mug, lid, reusable permanent filter strainer and holding basket. Quickly and conveniently brews directly into the 14oz stainless steel travel mug that fits most in car cup holders

WITH SLEEK COMPACT DESIGN - Coffee maker percolator brewer and insulated warmer mug are crafted from premium quality stainless steel and durable BPA free plastic to provide long-term strength and use. Compact modern design makes this the ideal one-cup coffee maker to keep on your countertop, whether in the kitchen, office or any space you choose

LIGHTWEIGHT AND PORTABLE - Small and lightweight automatic individual unit for coffee grounds can be easily transported from one location to another. Perfectly sized for tight counter spaces in your home, dorm or office so you can have a hot cup anywhere. And the permanent filter eliminates the use of disposable paper filters and reduces excess waste

AUTO SHUTOFF BREWING - The other perk of this single-cup coffee maker machine is its on/off power saver feature, which will automatically shut off after brewing to give you peace of mind as you head out the door. Also helps maintain temperature of the quick brewing coffee at an optimum degree to ensure a quality taste

EASY TO CLEAN - To clean this 6 x 5 x 10 inches (15 x 13 x 25 cm) coffee maker appliance, just unplug and wipe with damp cloth; to clean the 5.75 x 3.5 inches (15 x 9 cm) traveler mug, hand wash with gentle soap; to clean filter, simply rinse under warm water. (Note: Mug and filter are not dishwasher safe)
